lead_paragraph: SINATRA--Frank, Jr. January 10, 1944 - March 16, 2016. Frank Sinatra, Jr., passed away on March 16, 2016. A beloved son, brother, father, and uncle, he is survived by his mother, two sisters and three children. A private family service will be held later this month in Los Angeles. The family requests that donations in Frank's memory be made to The Frank Sinatra School of the Arts in Queens, NY, https://explor ingthearts.secure.force.com/ donate. Photo credit: George Kalinsky. 1/3
